depositFUSD((uint256,uint8,uint8,bytes)).details: Converts InEuint64  euint64 first, then calls confidentialTransferFrom(euint64 overload)      This avoids InvalidSigner since the euint64 overload only checks operator permission

depositFUSD((uint256,uint8,uint8,bytes)).notice: Deposit FUSD  user must first call setOperator on AUSD for this contract

onConfidentialTransferReceived(address,a.notice: FHERC20 callback  called by AUSD when user does confidentialTransferAndCall

requestBetDecrypt(uint256,uint256).notice: Step 1: Request decryption of your bet outcome (call before withdraw)

requestDecrypt(uint256).notice: Request decryption of pool totals - must be called before settleMarket

withdrawETH(uint256,uint256).notice: Step 2: Claim ETH winnings (call after decryption completes)

withdrawFUSD(uint256,uint256).notice: Step 2: Claim FUSD winnings (call after decryption completes)
